类 CommandOpts

  • java.lang.Object
    • CommandOpts

  • public class CommandOpts
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to read user's command options about numbers of guesses and hints to be set.

      • CommandOpts

        public CommandOpts(java.lang.String[] args)
        Constructor. Set maxguesses and maxhints as specified in the command line. The source can be string or file.
        参数:
        args -
